thread.title: Smoking no longer cool for teenagers but e-cigarettes remain a threat
thread.title_full: Smoking no longer cool for teenagers but e-cigarettes remain a threat

title: Smoking no longer cool for teenagers but e-cigarettes remain a threat
text:
Smoking no longer cool for teenagers ... Smoking no longer cool for teenagers but e-cigarettes remain a threat Next Story Prev Story 4 hrs ago Read more: The Age 
It used to be a rite of passage. In the 1980s, one in four teenagers smoked cigarettes weekly and many went on to get hooked.   The Age.
